api_list.api_description: Retrieve champion data for a specified version and language.

required_parameters.name: version
required_parameters.description: The version of the data files.

api_list.api_description: Get details about a specific Pokémon by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id or name
required_parameters.description: ID or name of the Pokémon.

query: I want detailed information about the League of Legends champion data in the latest version and also details about the Pokémon named Clefairy.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve rune data for a specified version and language.

required_parameters.name: version
required_parameters.description: The version of the data files.

api_list.api_description: Get details about a specific Pokémon ability by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id or name
required_parameters.description: ID or name of the Pokémon ability.

query: Can you provide me with rune data for the latest League of Legends version and also information about the Pokémon ability named Stench?

api_list.api_description: Retrieve item data for a specified version and language.

required_parameters.name: version
required_parameters.description: The version of the data files.

api_list.api_description: Get details about a specific Pokémon type by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id or name
required_parameters.description: ID or name of the Pokémon type.

query: I need information on items from the latest League of Legends version and details on the Pokémon type called Ground.
